about.title: About me
about.part_1: Technology fanatic and disruption-driven software engineer focusing on artificial general intelligence and passionate about emerging technologies, autonomous agents, distributed data (including distributed consensuses and blockchain protocols), and the mesh of things.
about.part_2: Aspiring to become an AGI teacher wishing to see from his living, a fully machine-assisted and harmonized world. With the use of a decentralized, distributed, borderless and self-sufficient autonomous network combining AGI, Blockchain, And MoT.
